title: Good health: talking feet
creator_credit: Albert Wallace, Philip Grosset and ATV Colour Productions
brief_description: Presents information on foot care and correct shoe fitting. Indicates problems caused by poorly fitted shoes, and the types of remedies appropriate to corns, tinea and warts.
